dcterms:description: The UA-Speech database contains audio files with the voices of 15 persons (11 men and 4 women) suffering from dysarthria with different degrees of severity, as well as recordings from 13 healthy control individuals. The audio files were recorded at 16 KHz using an array of 7 microphones and include utterances such as digits, computer commands, simple short words, multisyllable complex words, and the radio alphabet. The database is annotated with intelligibility scores based on medical tests conducted by specialists.
dcterms:title: UA-Speech database
